Text: I only downloaded this for the Lustrate Process cd, but it won't work for my itunes and my vlc player even has trouble. But when it does play it has great quality. I don't know how the rest of it works, but it is good quality

The Lustrate Process on this torrent does have some issues, but I was able to fix them up simply by converting the mp3 files to WAV files and then converting them back to mp3 (using Wavepad).

Great quality all around, this is the only Project Hate discog I have found so far. Thanks a lot, zibbik!
